source.title: Zadonshchina
source.annotator: Katie Sykes (242 sentences) and Marek Majer (8 sentences)
source.electronic-text-version: Substantially reworked version of Frček’s edition of the M2 manuscript (belonging to the State History Museum in Moscow, Muz. 2060, first half of the 16th century). This version 1. simplifies the editorial punctuation (only commas and full stops used), 2. removes all editorial expansions, insertions and corrections, 3. retains the editorial Arabic cardinal numerals, but inserts more complex constructions from the footnotes where available, 4. removes all capitalisation, 5. uses <я> even where Frček has <ꙗ>.
source.electronic-text-publisher: UiT The Arctic University of Norway
source.printed-text-title: Zádonština. Staroruský žalopěv o boji rusů s tatary r. 1380
